title: Client Issues
body:
So for about a year or so now my client has been pretty broken. Consistent dc's from the main client page and in champ select. It doesnt effect me ingame but greatly effects me getting into a game, i just got into my promos for gold and was trying to get into a game but my client kept dc'ing and now it says i abandoned champ select and have a 30m ban, does that mean i got the 5m ban too? I really need a fix I've been playing this game since season 1 and i cant take this anymore x.x 
P.S. My connection is stable i play on wired and have tried wireless too, both work 100% of the time on everything else i play.

replies.body: The 30 minute ban reflects an escalation due to consistent queue dodges.  Even though your connection might feel strong, it doesn't rule out network issues reaching the game server.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The steps here should get you squared away and back to game.  I also recommend doing any testing in custom games to prevent more penalties.  Hope that helps!
